Term.Name: Is source content from
Term.Description: To indicate which other category should be used as the pool of content to generate recommendations from

Term.Name: Is genre category link
Term.Description: Soft link to a category that represents a genre in the list of genres presented in the UI

Term.Name: Is omw hzn4 vod
Term.Description: Soft-link from root category to Horizon 4 VOD section
